name: Full-Body Strength (Barbell)
description: Compound lifts focused on squat, bench, deadlift variations with accessory work.

name: Bodyweight HIIT
description: High intensity intervals using only bodyweight — great for small spaces.

name: Upper Body Push
description: Focus on chest, shoulders and triceps with progressive overload.

name: Lower Body Hypertrophy
description: Higher volume for quads, hamstrings, and glutes — great for size.

name: Core & Mobility
description: Stretching, stability and core control exercises to support recovery.

name: Quick Arms Blast
description: Short superset routine for arms (biceps and triceps).

name: Endurance Run Plan
description: Structured run plan for building steady endurance.

name: Tabata Express
description: 20s work / 10s rest — four minutes per block for max conditioning.

name: Mobility Flow
description: Flow style mobility sequence to improve movement quality.

name: Push/Pull Circuit
description: Circuit alternating push and pull exercises for time.

name: Power Clean Focus
description: Technique and power development for Olympic lifting variations.

name: Low-Impact Cardio
description: Gentle cardio option for recovery or low-impact days.

name: Core Strength Series
description: Planks, anti-rotation drills and loaded carries to build core resilience.

name: Athletic Plyometrics
description: Explosive jump and landing drills to improve speed and power.

name: Stretch & Recovery
description: Guided recovery session with breathing, foam rolling and stretches.
